code: import{combineReducers}from"redux";import{persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import userReducer from"./user/user.reducer.js";import cartReducer from"./cart/cart.reducer.js";import directoryReducer from"./directory/directory.reducer.js";import galleryReducer from"./gallery/gallery.reducer.js";var persistConfig={key:"root",storage:storage,whitelist:["cart"]};var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userReducer,cart:cartReducer,directory:directoryReducer,gallery:galleryReducer});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
